mods.abstract: Photograph showing the Louisiana Demonstration Train with "Louisiana Demons[tration]" signage draped on the side of the train behind a group of men. The following individuals have been identified starting from the left: No. 4 W.H. Balis (probable), No. 10 W.R. Dodson, No. 11 W.H. Dalrymple, No. 13 E.S. Richardson, No. 14 E.L. Jordan.
mods.note: Compare photograph to the following publication. Demonstration Train Ends Successful Campaign Tour. (1910, October 16) The daily picayune, Vol.74 (No. 264), p. 4. Retrieved August 4, 2014, from http://docs.newsbank.com/openurl?ctx_ver=z39.88-2004&rft_id=info:sid/iw.newsbank.com:EANX&rft_val_format=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&rft_dat=1264D160C2E21CFD&svc_dat=HistArchive:ahnpdoc&req_dat=0D0CB538641481A0; Photograph of William H. Balis (approx. 1916). Retrieved August 4, 2014, from http://cdm16313.contentdm.oclc.org/cdm/singleitem/collection/LSU_UAP/id/2349/rec/1; Photograph of W.R. Dodson (approx. 1916). Retrieved August 4, 2014, from http://www.louisianadigitallibrary.org/cdm/singleitem/collection/LSU_UAP/id/2366/rec/114; Photograph of W.H. Dalrymple (approx. 1916). Retrieved August 4, 2014, from http://www.louisianadigitallibrary.org/cdm/singleitem/collection/LSU_UAP/id/2365/rec/111; Photograph of Edwin S. Richardson (approx. 1916). Retrieved August 4, 2014, from http://cdm16313.contentdm.oclc.org/cdm/singleitem/collection/LSU_UAP/id/2402/rec/1; Photograph of Elbert L. Jordan (approx. 1916). Retrieved August 4, 2014, from http://cdm16313.contentdm.oclc.org/cdm/singleitem/collection/LSU_UAP/id/2381/rec/2
